subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: D. Wayne Lukas, the 76-year old Hall of Fame trainer, has not had a winner in his last 109 graded stakes races, but he still has Kentucky Derby hopes.
snippet: D. Wayne Lukas, the 76-year old Hall of Fame trainer, has not had a winner in his last 109 graded stakes races, but he still has Kentucky Derby hopes.
